Group confusion matrices

group_metrices.Rd

Calculates coufusion matrices for each subgroup

group_matrices(
  data,
  group,
  probs = "probabilities",
  outcome,
  outcome_numeric,
  cutoff
)

Arguments

data

data frame
group

character name of column with group
probs

character name of column with probabilities
outcome

character name of column with outcome
outcome_numeric

numeric vector of outcome
cutoff

numeric cutoff for probabilities, deafult = 0.5

Value

list with values:

  • subgroup

    • tp - true positive values

    • fp - false positive values

    • tn - true negative values

    • fn - false negative values

Examples

data("compas")

glm_compas <- glm(Two_yr_Recidivism~., data=compas, family=binomial(link="logit"))
y_prob <- glm_compas$fitted.values

data <- compas
data$probabilities <- y_prob

y_numeric <- as.numeric(compas$Two_yr_Recidivism)-1

group_matrices(data,
               "Ethnicity",
                outcome = "Two_yr_Recidivism",
                 outcome_numeric = y_numeric,
                 cutoff = rep(0.45,6))
#> $Caucasian
#> $tp
#> [1] 392
#> 
#> $fp
#> [1] 282
#> 
#> $tn
#> [1] 999
